document_data.name: the Sheltering Hand
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sheltering Hand''' was a temple to [[Tymora]] in [[Waymoot]], [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Activities: The temple provided healing services to those who took risks even if they weren't followers of Tymora. The clergy believed that helping members of other faiths might one day lead them to follow Tymora. In addition to healing, patrons often received hot meals and a purse full of coins when they departed the temple.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Chancepriest of the temple was a dignified man named [[Gothric]].
document_data.Defenses: Because of their affluent leadership, the temple housed a [[guardian golem]] that would defend the temple against any attack.
